src:
Malian government confirms at least 54 dead in jihadist attack on military in the north
02 Nov 2019, 09:35 by EndPlay
BAMAKO, Mali - BAMAKO, Mali (AP) - Malian government confirms at least 54 dead in jihadist attack on military in the north.
